attributes.action: seek a review with the Ministry of Defence/Thames Valley Police, regarding the procedures following the repatriation of service personnel who are killed whilst on active service, once they return to the United Kingdom. That they be given an escort either by the police, military or combination of both,  on the whole of their journey from Wooten Bassett to the John Radcliffe Hospital.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
